name: MLCConvolutionDescriptor
desc: A configuration object you use to create a convolution or fully connected layer.

items.name: init(type: MLCConvolutionType, kernelSizes: (height: Int, width: Int), inputFeatureChannelCount: Int, outputFeatureChannelCount: Int, groupCount: Int, strides: (y: Int, x: Int), dilationRates: (y: Int, x: Int), paddingPolicy: MLCPaddingPolicy)
items.desc: Creates a descriptor for the type, sizes, number of feature channels, group count, strides, dilation rates, and padding policy you specify.

items.name: init(transposeWithKernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int, inputFeatureChannelCount: Int, outputFeatureChannelCount: Int)
items.desc: Creates a descriptor for convolution transpose with the kernel sizes and number of feature channels you specify.

items.name: init(depthwiseWithKernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int, inputFeatureChannelCount: Int, channelMultiplier: Int)
items.desc: Creates a descriptor for depthwise convolution with the kernel sizes, number of input feature channels, and channel multiplier you specify.

items.name: enum MLCConvolutionType
items.desc: The convolution type specified for a convolution layer.

items.name: var kernelSizes: (height: Int, width: Int)
items.desc: A tuple that contains the kernel sizes for height and width.

items.name: var inputFeatureChannelCount: Int
items.desc: The number of feature channels in the input tensor.

items.name: var outputFeatureChannelCount: Int
items.desc: The number of feature channels in the output tensor.

items.name: var strides: (y: Int, x: Int)
items.desc: A tuple that contains the kernel strides for y and x.

items.name: var dilationRates: (y: Int, x: Int)
items.desc: A tuple that contains the dilation rates for y and x.

items.name: var isConvolutionTranspose: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether this is a convolution transpose.

items.name: var usesDepthwiseConvolution: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether you use depthwise convolution.
